name: B.Sc
description: Bachelor of Computer Science with comprehensive business and accounting knowledge. Covers subjects like Accounting, Business Law, Economics, and Management.

name: B.Com (Hons)
description: Honors program in Commerce with advanced specialization in Accounting, Finance, and Business Management. Ideal for students pursuing CA, CS, or CMA.

name: B.Sc (Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics)
description: Bachelor of Science in PCM. Perfect foundation for engineering, research, and higher studies in physical sciences.

name: B.Sc (Physics, Chemistry, Biology)
description: Bachelor of Science in PCB. Ideal for students aspiring to pursue medical, pharmacy, or biotechnology careers.

name: B.A (English, History, Political Science)
description: Bachelor of Arts with focus on English Literature, Indian History, and Political Science. Great for civil services and teaching careers.

name: B.A (Economics, Sociology, Psychology)
description: Bachelor of Arts in social sciences. Covers economic principles, social behavior, and human psychology.

name: BBA
description: Bachelor of Business Administration. Professional course covering management, marketing, finance, and entrepreneurship.

name: BCA
description: Bachelor of Computer Applications. Covers programming, software development, database management, and web technologies.

name: M.A (English)
description: Master of Arts in English Literature. Advanced literary studies, critical analysis, and research in English literature.
